General.Name: Groupe Minoteries SA
General.Description: Groupe Minoteries SA processes, refines, and markets grain and food raw materials in Switzerland. The company offers flour and cereal products; organic flours and ready-to-eat products, such as muesli, flakes, etc., as well as breadcrumbs and breading solutions. It also provides services for industry and trade, and commercial bakers. The company was founded in 1670 and is headquartered in Granges-près-Marnand, Switzerland.
